content.detailedDescription: At my friends justins old house.He hit the baseball in the air and i saw it.Idid not know what it was at first.I thought it was weird and cool before andafter.It was a white disc moving side to side really quick.I turned to tell myfriend and i looked back and it went up behind a tree real quick!!!
content.summary: I saw a white disk in the sky moving side to side

content.detailedDescription: I was at home on friday, feb. 9th(the first night) and noticed a brightlight in the sky. after watching for 20 minutes i looked through binoculars andsay a large round shape, with whitel lights in the center and red and greenaround it. it stayed there for over 1 hour, then slowly decended and truned redbefore going below the trees. this obhect has returned for 3 night now, and manypeople are watching it. i did take a very good video of this object and amwondering what it is.
content.summary: Bright light seen in escanaba sky for 3 nights in

content.detailedDescription: (you can type over theseinstructions.)please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typedpage). it was after a hail storm  and we were looking out of the front window ofour home.  it moved differently than an airplane flying or a kite.  there werewhite and green lights on the one side that we could see that flashed from oneside of the craft to the other in a steady cannon pattern.  we ran outside tosee it,  and the it zoomed away-  we were young atthe time-  our mother saidthat we imagined it
content.summary: Large flying hovering triangular craft w/ lights o
Unlike any ufo ever seen

content.detailedDescription: I recently moved to denton, tx from claremore, ok.  i was watching kdfw fox 4news tonight (out of dallas) and a report of the tex files featured the dfwchapter of mufon and a recent (2-7-01 i think) report of an ufo from bishop, tx(near corpus christi).  they showed the video tape from the bishop, tx sightingand i was stunned to find that looked exactly like an object i filmed indecember 2000 when i still lived in claremore, ok.  i filmed the object using my8mm camera and showed the video to family and friends, all agreeing that it wasa very strange object.  as the bishop tape showed it appeared to be a star orpinprick of light but then would suddenly turn all kinds of different colors andthen do this really strange moving around erratically and would increase in size3b as it did this you can see on the tape what appears to be a disc spinningrapidly, i guess.  im not really sure how to explain it, but it looks exactlythe way the object from the bishop, tx tape did.  over the next three nights isaw as many as two or three similiar objects in the sky.  i also noticedmilitary type jets (f-16s ?) that fly over claremore at really low altitudesappearing to fly towards the object3b claremore is not close to an air force base and normally do not notice anymilitary craft at all.  initially, i reported the incident to the national uforeporting center web site but their response was the often times the atmospherecauses a twinkling effect of a planet or star.  i dubiously accepted thisexplanation, but after seeing the bishop, tx video on the news tonight i knowthat the object i filmed was the same kind of thing.  i have no idea what itwas, but i know it unnerved me.
content.summary: Like bishop, tx sighting

content.detailedDescription: To private
content.summary: Backyard bbq w/my friends

content.detailedDescription: The incident i am about to report,took place back in 1997 as previously enteredin the above form. i dont know why i only now am beginning to talk about this(and other incidents). i did try to mention it to others at the time, butrealized no one believed me. i since mentioned it to a few close friends and wasmet with a luke-warm, somewhat-validating responce.Around 15 years ago ideveloped more than just an interest about the paranormal/ ufo subject matter.It started as a spin off to the research i was doing in regards to my recoveryfrom alcohol addiction and other health related problems. i ended up in the newage section of the book stores and stumbled on whitley striebers communion, andits been full speed ahead in my research
content.summary: Sighting of a craft that first appeared as a star.

content.detailedDescription: We had just arrived home after going out for dinner, as we got out of the car my#2 son said whats that?And pointed to the trees approx. 150yds away. just abovethe treeline a craft was coming towards us directly down the street. it wastriangular, black, with orange lights at each corner, and completely silent. itwas tilted in its flight as though banking, but was flying straight and true. asit passed over us, we could hear an electric crackling sound, but it wasotherwise silent.It was also travelling no faster than a fast walk. we watchedit until it disappeared to the west towards portland ore. aprox. 5 minutes.
content.summary: A craft flew soundlessly overhead at no more 60-80
Green light fast and low

content.detailedDescription: I was standing out on my balcony, smoking a cigarette, and looking out into thenight sky at approx. 5:50 a.M.  i saw this large light grey object moving fromthe south-southwest toward me.  my initial reaction was what is that? i watchedwith amazement as i realized it was moving very quickly and smoothly. when itreached its closest i was suddenly struck be several reactions:it was movingfaster than any jet i had ever seen3b it was huge, maybe over 100 feet in length and nearly so in height, somewhateliptical in shape (it was difficult to determine its size in the night sky)
content.summary: Large light grey  object , nighttime, seattle

content.detailedDescription: I observed the object for over 2 hours.  during that time i attempted toasertain why the object seemed to dwell over a specific area.  my assumption isthat the object was perhaps over the site of the now decommissioned trojannucular power plant.  i also observed what appeared to be tiny flashbulb typelights both around and moving from below up twards the object.  the presence tothese lights was not constant.  i observed the lights 4 or 5 times during the 2hours.I would appreciate knowing if you are able to link my observation with anyothers.  thank you.
content.summary: Unusual object in the sky observed from my home
My two brothers and i saw something on our way hom

content.detailedDescription: 1. my family was in northern wisconsin camping.  my father and i were fishingoff an old wooden train bridge(which we did quite often) at the rat river, wi.2.My father noticed it first and pointed it out to me.3. i wasnt sure what it waswhen i saw it.4. i was surprised and interested and continued to observe itthrought the sighting.5. what i saw was a small red light like a pinpoint orstar that flew in random directions from behind one star to a point behindanother star.  it continued to do this for the entire time of the sighting.6. itstopped darting out from behind the stars.
content.summary: Ufo sighting in northern wisconsin

content.detailedDescription: For a detailed online report please seehttp://members.Home.Net/tlemire/annarbor.Htmlthe 3 witnesses were in the downtown ann arbor area, going to a local coffeeshop, when their attention was drawn by two other unknown witnesses to a"horseshoe or c-shaped" object flying in the sky.  the witnesses did notimmediately recognize this object as anything familiar, but at first thought itwas a promotional balloon.  the object was not lit and appeared to bereflecting the downtown lights.  they watched the object slowly movenorth-northwest and fade away into the haze.  the witnesses heard no noiseassociated with the object.
content.summary: Horseshoe shaped ufo seen in ann arbor, michigan

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i were walkin up to our appartment on the side walk and i lookedup and saw a light in the sky. i stood for about 10 seconds, just looking atthis thing. it was going south west in a sort of snake like pattern. my mom askme what i was doing than she looked up as well. about 15 seconds after shelooked we both saw it stop, it was really up there and than it had stopped andwas stationary for another 20-25 seconds, than it shot off going the exactopposite direction wich would have been north east. and to this day we stilltalk about it. 1 more person saw it but he thinks im dumb writing it in to youfolks. i would be eager to hear from someone if there have been any othersightings of it that night in or around winnipeg, manitoba, canada. thank you
content.summary: A dim light in the sky, moved snake like across th

content.detailedDescription: Was having a cigarette in the outside break area at work. was looking up. saw avery fast, brown, arrow-headed shaped object pass overhead from sw to ne. sofast that i almost didnt give it a second thought until i saw what i thought atfirst to be a childs silver helium balloon. after watching the balloon for asecond or two i realized that a balloon would not be visable at this apparentaltitude 30,000-35,000 ft. the shimmering silver balloon craft made highlydexterious movements not capable by aircraft or balloon while following the samepath(and was following exact trajectory of the first object.). i really did notknow what to think after seeing this.
content.summary: Large brown arrow shaped craft followed by silver

content.detailedDescription: This occurred just outside gulf breeze, fl at what was once camp big heart, nowgulf islands natl. seashore (navel live oak).  3 of us on a boy scout camp-outhad wandered off around midnight to go sit on a sand dune and smoke cigarettes. we had been there a while when we noticed the object slowly moving from east towest over the intercoastal waterway.  it traveled very slowly -less than 10 mph. we were all transfixed on the object until it pulled even with us, whereupon weall freaked out and ran back to camp.  this object looked exactly like theobject later reported in the infamous gulf breeze sightings.
content.summary: Gulf breeze early seventies

content.detailedDescription: I was in my car during my shift as a security officer next to the frontiercasino. while sitting inside my car facing south i saw an object flying over thetreasure island casino. it looked like a blimp but shorter and bulky. whatcalled my attention was it had no inscriptions and no lights like regular blimpsdo, and i was close to the maccarran airport. i think nobody is allowed to beflying at 3:20 in the morning whith no lights. this object was being illuminatedby the casinos lights. when it moved outside this lights it became invisible.The impression i got was that of a big animal fliyng, but it wasnt that forsure. thanks.
content.summary: Brown object gliding with no lights

content.detailedDescription: I did not witness the event at actual time of occurrance. i set up my vidiocamera as shown on sightings. i set up video camera in the window and blockedthe sun with the frame of the window. when i veiwed the tape i saw many oddstreaking objects all the way through the tape, and then i saw a much largerstreaking object. i then slowed the tape and saw the object moving from right toleft at a very fast pace. i have shown this tape to a mufon agent in my area,paul coley of linden pa. i havent talked to him since. i actually wanted to getin contact with him. thats why i am reporting this. is it possible to get hise-mail or give him mine. i would like to go to one of the meetings again. thankyou
content.summary: Video taped sighting
Ufo sighted in waikato area of new zealand eleven

content.detailedDescription: 1. driving home from work to pick up my son. 2. the three lights appeared out ofplace. 3. thought they were a radio tower or airplane.4. realized they werent atower and or plane,reacted surprised..5. they were three lights. each lightabove the each other, about 10 seconds..Then the two upper lights started tomove (one leaving to the left.. the other leaving to the right). leaving fromfrom sight. then the remaining bottom light appeared to have three lights on itthe left anbd right flashing together very brightly. it at first appeared to becloser as i drove toward it. the center light was red and it seemed to move leftand right in between the flashing lights. then the lights together moved slowlydown until i couldnt see it. at the time i thought it was gone and then i roseup again then it seemed to hover to the right ( i was driving north bound on belair rd.)6. i had made a turn off of bel air rd. and i could no longer see theobject
content.summary: Three strange lights appeared as i drove

content.detailedDescription: The 2 of us were on a small power boat in mid-summer about 7 years ago. we wereabout one half mile off shore at approx. 10pm. the motor was not running, wewere listening to music when we saw the baseball size white sphere off the sternof the boat. it was about 5 feet above the water and it was blinking  on and offmaking no noise. from what i reacll, it was moving slowly in a northwestdirection from the moment i first noticed it. it was no more than 10 feet away!It continued on a straight path blinking about every 1.5 seconds until wecouldnt see it anymore in the darkness. neither of us could explain it at thetime and cannot to this day.I recently saw a film clip of a very similar objectthat was filmed in the area of a crop formation in england.I would be veryinterested in finding out if anyone else (boaters, fisherman, etc.) has seen anylow flying balls over lake erie.I would be willing to talk to anyone interested.
content.summary: Pulsing orb on lake erie
Oddly moving light above the everglades

content.detailedDescription: Driving to work in the morning.  object appeared in the western sky.Thoughtobject was a large cardboard box floating across the sky.  object hadwhat appeared to be an elephant trunk pertruding from the side bottom area. gotoutof vehicle, no sounds were heard.  object stayed on steady course andconstant altitude.  object then moved more southeast and dissapeared over thecountryside.
content.summary: Dark boxlike figure floating across morning sky

content.detailedDescription: 12:55pt,eureka,ca. while walking my son home from school26 the grocery store, he pointed out a contrail and jet. it was unusual in thatthere was a shaft of darknessthat the jet was on a parallel course with (bearingapprox.300 deg. over the ocean). he asked me why there was a dark line that thejet was following. as a nws/faa certified weather observer, i should have had ananswer, but i didnt. i say professionally that it was not smoke, but a shaft ofdiminished light, and the jet was following it exactly. then, about 1000 yardsin front of the jet, at the terminus of the shaft, there was a very bright burstof white light, with a spherical object within. altitude was approx.16-18kft.The object then disappeared, and the shaft disippated after about 1 min. i haveworked aviation weather since 1993, and served on an aircraft carrier beforethat. i have never seen anything like this before. i know aircraft and airweapons. this was not a conventional aircraft.
content.summary: A horizontal shaft of darkness and a bright flash

content.detailedDescription: On sunday, november 19, 2000, i was having trouble sleeping.  it was a clearnight, so i moved aside the window blinds in my dorm room (ucsd, la jolla) andlooked up at the clear night sky, the constellation orion almost directlyoverhead at that time.  i immediately noticed something strange3b two faintly visible red dots at very high altitude were coming from the west,going east under the constellation i had been looking at (orions belt).  theobject on the left side moved in a straight line going east, and matched speedwith the object on the right side, which appeared to be doing maneuvers (flyingin loops while moving from west to east across the sky).  after a minute or two,they both disappeared from view (extreme altitude and distance).  a few minutesafter this event, a very large, dull red object (self-illuminated) flew overheadfrom the north headed south at high speed, looking somewhat blimp-like (withfurrows, bulges) while rotating on its horizontal and diagonal axes.  itmaintained altitude (between 100-500 feet up?) for some distance, then gainedaltitude very, very rapidly until it reached the level of the previous objects(and looked the same at that altitude), and disappeared from view (extremealtitude).  after these events, another possibly unrelated event occurred nearthe same area of the sky (but in space?)3b i saw between 8 and 10 evenly spaced bright flashes of light.  the first fewflashes were stationary, but with each succeeding flash, the point of the flashmoved in a southwestern direction.  the last flash was orange and elongated,while the previous ones were all bright white.  one of the flashes during thisevent was accompanied by an almost simultaneous flash in another part of the sky(a few inches away in my perspective, if i held my hand at arms length to wherei had been looking).
content.summary: Strange objects in san diego area night sky
Tight formation of 5 diamond shaped objects flying
Craft hovering above a barn near buckeye lake
Cluster ufos over las vegas

content.detailedDescription: V-formation of light(?), white-blue balls(8-12), at undefined height, at fastspeed disapearing in one point.During the period of 3-5 sec, they crossed 2/3 ofthe skyscape.
content.summary: Formation moving on the sky
